basic.description:
Topics include techniques of integration; differential equations, and multivariable differential calculus. 
NOTE    For students who have credit for a one-term course in calculus.Topics covered are the same as those in the Winter term of MATH 121/6.0.
LEARNING HOURS    126 (36L;12T;78P)
basic.subject: MATH
basic.title: Differential and Integral Calculus II

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite     MATH123 or permission of the Department.
Exclusion    No more than 6.0 units from MATH120; MATH121; MATH122; MATH123; MATH124; MATH126
